meanings.definition: A surgical procedure in which an artificial opening is created in the body for the discharge of waste.
meanings.sent1: After the ostomy, the waste could leave the body through the new opening.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the ostomy would help with waste removal.
meanings.sent3: The ostomy decided to throw a party for all the waste leaving the body.
meanings.sent4: The ostomy was like a new door for waste to exit the body.
meanings.sent5: The ostomy was a lifesaver, allowing waste to escape and keep the body healthy.

meanings.definition: The opening created by such a surgical procedure.
meanings.sent1: The ostomy opening required special care to prevent infections.
meanings.sent2: She felt self-conscious about the ostomy visible on her abdomen.
meanings.sent3: The ostomy opening seemed to have a mind of its own, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her ostomy opening was a reminder of the surgery and her resilience.
meanings.sent5: The ostomy opening was like a small window into her body's inner workings.
